The code is fine.

!playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("....")) {// ! sets the fallowing event to negative. if not equal.

item.title: Equipable by the owner only?
item.dc:creator: @Anieli Anieli
item.description:
@Anieli wrote:

Still getting the errors so could it be something to do with where i put it in the code? Here is where it is currently:

if(wearID == 6570 && killedJad == 0){
sM(“You must have defeated TzTok-Jad to wear this cape.”);
return false;
}
if(wearID == 4084 && playerRights != 3)
return false;
if(wearID == 1052 && q7 != 15){
sM(“You must complete Legends Quest to equip this.”);
return false;
}
if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 6746 && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“Ownersname”))
return true;
} else {
if(wearID == 6746){
sM(“Only the owner may wield this!.”);
return false;
}
if(wearID == 4035 && q5 == 3){
triggerTele(2650, 4565, 1);
}
if(wearID == 4031 && q5 == 3){
npcId = 1463;
npcId2 = npcId;
isNpc = true;
specGFX(160);
}
if(wearID == 4151 && FightType == 2){
FightType = 3;
SkillID = 3;
}

Read full topic

item.title: Equipable by the owner only?
item.dc:creator: @king_gauge king gauge
item.description:
@king_gauge wrote:

Well, either like the first or like this

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 6746 && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Ownersname")) return true; } else { if(wearID == 6746){ sM("Only the owner may wield this!."); return false; }

It would be one of those three. (either the one i did, or one of the 2 that frostscapeserver did)

item.title: Equipable by the owner only?
item.dc:creator: @frostscapeserver frostscapeserver
item.description:
@frostscapeserver wrote:

Umm it would be more like

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 6746 && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Ownersname")) return true; } else { sM("Only the owner may wield this!."); return false; }

Or this, Idk which order:

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 6746 && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Ownersname")) return true; } else { return false; sM("Only the owner may wield this!."); }

Read full topic

item.title: Equipable by the owner only?
item.dc:creator: @Anieli Anieli
item.description:
@Anieli wrote:

Really sorry about this guys im still very new to coding and was just wondering how I can make certain items only. I cant use anything to do with playerRights as this is not how the client.java is configured to recognise the owner. The owner is actually an admin but with a different title and ability’s. At the moment the code for one of these items is:

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 6746 && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“Ownersname”))
return false;

if(wearID == 6746){
sM(“Only the owner may wield this!.”);
return false;
}

This returns no errors when compiling but when the owner tries to equip it it says only the owner may wield this. Anybody have any suggestions?

Read full topic
